name: 2018- 10th International Conference on Communication Software and Networks ICCSN
content: Conference official website：http://www.iccsn.org Meeting time：July 6-9, 2018 Meeting place：China · Chengdu Published by：Accepted paper will be included into ICCSN 2018 Conference Proceedings,which will be published by IEEE and be sent to be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus after the conference. ICCSN 2015 Conference Proceedings has been included into IEEE Xplore and indexed by EI Compendex/Scopus ICCSN 2016 Conference Proceedings has been included into IEEE Xplore and indexed by EI Compendex/Scopus ICCSN 2017 Conference Proceedings has been included into IEEE Xplore. Paper Submission:May 01, 2018 Submission instructions： 1.ICCSN is utterly intolerant of plagiarism,Submitted papers are expected to contain original work executed by eht authors with adequate,proper and scholarly citations to the work of others.It is the job of the authors to clearly Reviewers are charged to ensure these standards are met. 2.By submitting a manuscript to ICCSN,authors acknowledge that it has not been previously published or accepted for publication in sunstantially similar form in ay peer-reviewed venue wieh publicly accessible papers,including journals,conferences,workshops,or others peer-reviewed,archival forums. Conference Contact: conference Secretary mailbox: iccsn\_conference@163.com
